question: What is Shopify and how does it work?
answer:
Shopify is an all-in-one e-commerce platform that lets you set up, manage, and grow your online business. It provides everything you need to sell products online.

Think of Shopify as a shopping mall kiosk you can set up online. They provide the space (your store), the tools to showcase your products (product listings, photos), and the infrastructure to handle sales (payment processing, inventory management). You just need to bring your products and customize your storefront to attract customers.

Shopify is great for people new to ecommerce and existing buisnesses looking for a new platform.
